title: Non-academic learning outcomes portfolio documentation process

context.prior_knowledge: Informal mathematical knowledge acquired through workplace or personal experience
context.additional_context: Process for Professionals in Medical/Legal/Technical Fields to Systematize Math Competencies into Portfolios Based on Work and Daily Experiences

learning_goals: Learners can complete a draft portfolio analyzing mathematical competencies based on non-academic experiences within eight weeks
Learners can document their learning outcomes in three or more categories according to the Carter classification system
Learners can improve the academic validity of their portfolios at least twice through peer feedback and online consulting
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
